field.name: moduleclass_sfx
field.label: Module Class Suffix
field.description: A suffix to be applied to the css class of the module, this allows individual module styling.

field.name: pblatest_mode
field.label: Mode
field.description: Mode used to display latest entries.

field.name: pblatest_connections
field.label: Connections Only
field.description: Specify if only posts by or to users the user is connected to should display

field.name: pblatest_include
field.label: Include
field.description: Specify which users to display using a comma seperated list (e.g. 62,38,91). Leave blank to display all.

field.name: pblatest_exclude
field.label: Exclude
field.description: Specify which users NOT to display using a comma seperated list (e.g. 62,38,91). Leave blank to display all.

field.name: pblatest_substitutions
field.label: All display types support full subsitutions for the Poster, Recipient, and the Entry it self. To take full usage of each subsitution use the following formats: {p[FIELD]} for poster substitutions, {r[FIELD]} for recipient subsitutions, and {e[FIELD]} for entry subsitutions. Entries support the following substitutions only: date, title, post. Poster and recipient support the following additional substitutions: avatar_url, name_url, profile_url.
